description: For a healthier dessert that's still a show stopper, you can't go past this sensational strawberry and ricotta tart with a golden almond crust.
name: Healthier Strawberry & Almond Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place ricotta, honey and remaining vanilla in a large bowl. Fold to combine. Add threequarters of the strawberry mixture and gently fold to combine. Spoon mixture over base and spread to cover. Spoon over remaining strawberry mixture. Roughly chop remaining almonds and sprinkle over top. Serve.

Place ricotta, honey and remaining vanilla in a large bowl. Fold to combine. Add threequarters of the strawberry mixture and gently fold to combine. Spoon mixture over base and spread to cover. Spoon over remaining strawberry mixture. Roughly chop remaining almonds and sprinkle over top. Serve.
